alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mitchell County through 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beloit, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beloit around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Asherville and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
